title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\ValueMapper
name: ValueMapper
description: Maps values to their expected BigQuery types. This class is intended for internal use only.

params.name: returnInt64AsObject
params.description: If true, 64 bit integers will be returned as a Google\Cloud\Core\Int64 object for 32 bit platform compatibility.

methods.name: fromBigQuery
methods.description: Maps a value coming from BigQuery to the expected format for use in the library.

methods.name: toBigQuery
methods.description: Maps a user provided value to the expected BigQuery format.

methods.name: toParameter
methods.description: Maps a value to the expected parameter format.
